text:
8 AI websites I (actually) use every day:

1/ Gamma (gamma.app)

☑ Replaces: Google Slides / PowerPoint.
☑ ChatGPT meets PowerPoint.
☑ Free plan available.

2/ ChatGPT (chat.com)

☑ Google, but with a brain + knows me perfectly.
☑ Deep reasoning, quick search & PDF reports.
☑ Also generates accurate images, with text.
☑ Free + Pro at $20/month (worth it).

3/ Claude (claude.ai)

☑ Better than ChatGPT to write (with custom style).
☑ The new Opus-4 + extended thinking is great.
☑ Go for the $20 plan.

4/ Midjourney (midjourney.com)

☑ Replaces: Blog designers and image generation.
☑ Turn text into scroll-stopping images.
☑ Starts at $10/month.

5/ Ideogram (ideogram.ai)

☑ I only use the API for pixel-perfect image with text.
☑ It's not artistic, but accurate. No infographic yet.
☑ $0.04 per image.

6/ EasyGen (easygen.io)

☑ Replaces: Ghostwriters, copywriters.
☑ The only tool I trust for LinkedIn.
☑ Free trial available.

7/ Opus Clip (opus.pro)

☑ Replaces: Manual editing, video editors.
☑ Cuts long videos into viral shorts.
☑ Free trial available.

8/ Synthesia (synthesia.io)

☑ Replaces: Camera, mic, editing setup.
☑ Create videos with your avatar.
☑ Starts at $22/month

Reshare ♻ to help others hire their (AI) team.
